Uses of Class
camzup.core.Face2

Packages that use Face2 
Package Description
camzup.core  

  • Uses of Face2 in camzup.core

    Methods in camzup.core that return Face2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Face2 Mesh2.getFace​(int i, Face2 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
    Face2[] Mesh2.getFaces()
    Gets an array of faces from the mesh.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZ​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZGlobal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.rotateZLocal​(float radians)
    Rotates all coordinates in the face by an angle around the z axis.
    Face2 Face2.scale​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar.
    Face2 Face2.scale​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a vector.
    Face2 Face2.scaleGlobal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face2 Face2.scaleGlobal​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's position.
    Face2 Face2.scaleLocal​(float scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's centroid from each vertex, scales, then adds the centroid.
    Face2 Face2.scaleLocal​(Vec2 scale)
    Scales all coordinates in the face by a scalar; subtracts the face's centroid from each vertex, scales, then adds the centroid.
    Face2 Face2.set​(Vert2... vertices)
    Sets this face's vertices to refer to a an array.
    Face2 Face2.translate​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the face by a vector.
    Face2 Face2.translateGlobal​(Vec2 v)
    Translates all coordinates in the face by a vector; uses global coordinates, i.e., doesn't consider the face's orientation.
    Methods in camzup.core with parameters of type Face2 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    static Vec2 Face2.centroid​(Face2 face, Vec2 target)
    Finds the centroid of a face by averaging all the coordinates in its list of vertices.
    int Face2.compareTo​(Face2 face)
    Compares this face to another by hash code.
    Face2 Mesh2.getFace​(int i, Face2 target)
    Gets a face from the mesh.
